title: Indo
typeOfFood: Ovo, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Indonesian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indonesian cuisine with vegan suitable choices including rujak mango papaya salad, tofu sate, gado gado vegetable salad, bakwan potato fritters, tahu goreng crispy garlic tofu, lumpia, sup sayur vegetable soup with thin rice noodles, karri tahu curry tofu, balado tahu tofu stir fry, and asam manis tahu sweet and sour tofu.
